title: Fix broken hooks symlink on devbox
description:
The ~/.claude/hooks symlink points to non-existent /home/dev/projects/dotfiles/.claude/hooks. This breaks automatic session registration and stop event notifications.

Context:
- Devbox used to have dotfiles repo which contained hooks
- After migration to workstation repo, the symlink became dangling
- Without hooks: sessions don't auto-register, stop events don't fire notifications
- The /notify-telegram skill now works around this by manual registration, but stop notifications still won't work

Fix options:
1. Add hooks to workstation repo and deploy via home-manager
2. Create hooks in assets/claude/hooks/ similar to other assets
3. Configure hooks in Claude Code settings.json instead of symlinks
